reviewText: The featured dancers are very well seasoned and entertaining. I was hoping for more instructions to learn to step. This video gives a lot of history of what lead up to 'Chicago Stepping'. Just not enough dancing instructions for me. Very basic.

It shows that this was done some time ago, but the footage, history, and influential people make this what it is. There could have been more instruction and better production quality. Too much time on the fashion show, and not enough time on the ball they mentioned.
